short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tip: Instant A/B testing for modern web apps, enabling real-time feature and layout experiments without backend changes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tip is your ultimate tool for optimizing web applications through seamless A/B testing. Imagine being able to ideate different versions of your website's features and layouts instantly without any hassle, or maybe just make a circle somewhere to let developer know what to change? With Tip, this is now a reality. Here's why Tip is a game-changer:

Whether you're a developer aiming to boost your web app's performance or a product manager focused on improving user engagement, Tip provides the tools you need to make informed decisions and deliver an exceptional user experience.
